title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Lightning  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Lightning  This week the area around Capulin has chances of thunderstorms. If you are on a trail and hear thunder or see lightning, please return to your vehicle as soon as possible. Rangers will close all trails once the lightning reaches 10 miles.
